description.english: Check out our Twitter feed or Facebook page
Play Major Mayhem on 3 consecutive days
Completely dismantle the Giant Death Machine
Defeat all the red bonus ninjas
Discover all the multiplier call outs
Remove 1,000 hats from enemies that are already dead
Hit an enemy with every shot in a mission
Finish the Tropics in Survival mode
Finish the Desert in Survival mode
Defeat the end boss (Classic or Survival mode)
Complete all the missions in a row without dying (Classic or Survival mode)
Earn 3 medals on all Tropic missions in Classic mode
Earn 3 medals on all Metropolis missions in Classic mode
Earn 3 medals on all Desert missions in Classic mode
Play in all 3 locations during a single Arcade game
Shoot 30 chickens in a single Arcade game
Rescue 5 hostages in a single Timebomb game
Use 5 or more weapons in one Timebomb game
Get 100 double kills with the Shotgun
Defeat 100 enemies by shooting through an object
Defeat 500 enemies with the Sniper Rifle
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Sniper Rifle
Defeat 500 enemies with the Grenade Launcher
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Grenade Launcher
Defeat 500 enemies with the Light Machine Gun
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Light Machine Gun
Defeat 500 enemies with the Automatic Shotgun
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Automatic Shotgun
Defeat 500 enemies with the Automatic Sniper Rifle
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Automatic Sniper Rifle
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Auto Launcher
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Auto Launcher
Defeat 500 enemies with the Plasma Rifle
Defeat 2,000 enemies with the Plasma Rifle
Defeat 500 enemies with a silenced weapon
Defeat 2,000 enemies with a silenced weapon
Defeat 500 enemies with a Chicken Cannon
Defeat 2,000 enemies with a Chicken Cannon
Use the Silenced Pistol while wearing the Tuxedo
Unlock all the weapons in the Armory
Unlock all the clothing items in the Armory
Purchase one of each of the 5 power ups
Use the Light Machine Gun and wear the red bandana as Rambro
Use the Chicken Cannon and wear the chicken hat as the General
